entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as being very ill, with a clammy cold and feeling hopeless. He is also shown to be trembling and whispering.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as understanding Dudley's situation and supplying the correct phrase that Dudley was trying to remember.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as having a forced calm voice and being concerned about Dudley's well-being.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is described as laying an anxious hand on Dudley's forehead to feel his temperature.

relationships.description: Dudley has symptoms of being ill, which Harry understands.
Uncle Vernon is concerned about Dudley's well-being and asks him what happened.
